Immature

✘

FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY: This bowel-busting party game is a smash with kids, teens and adults! Ideal for immature people ages 8 to 88.
SURPRISINGLY STRATEGIC: With 83 hilarious & strategic cards, you’ll laugh (and cry) as you battle to become the Poo King. Be the first to build a poo pyramid to win. But beware of your “friends” who will sabotage you with crap attacks!
SUPER POPULAR (Poop-ular?): Created by comedians, this game made quite the kerplop on Kickstarter, surpassing the funding goal by 3,600%! Thousands of customers can attest, it’s fartastic fun for family game night, card games for two players or gag gifts.
EASY TO LEARN & PLAY: Takes 5 minutes to learn and 15-30 minutes to play. Perfect for 2-4 players.
BRILLIANT GIFT IDEA: Makes the perfect birthday for boys, girls, parents, adults, friends, or family as well as any board game or card game lover. Makes a great birthday gift, Fathers Day gift or even Fourth of July gift (thanks George Washingturd). Perfect for picnic games, camping games or travel games that will have you crap attacking your friends and family.

Product Description

1 How To Play 2 The Set Up 3 On Your Turn 4 Action Cards = Spicy 5 ..and the Winner is!

Created by a 7 year old named Alex

Alex loves games and decided to create his own! For TACO VS. BURRITO, he spent months dreaming up ingredients, planning, and rethinking gameplay, and testing it thoroughly with people of all ages

When you buy TACO VS. BURRITO you are not only getting an amazing game that you’ll love but you are also helping a young entrepreneur get his business off the ground.

Thank you from Team Taco!

More games from the makers of Taco vs Burrito

Wildly Popular All-Ages Card Game – TvB soared on Kickstarter, surpassing the initial goal by 2,400%! A sensation at the Indie Game Showcase at Emerald City Comicon!
Surprisingly Strategic – Basic gameplay is easy to master but the Action Cards shift the game into unpredictable territory. Exciting up to the very last card!
Create by a Kid, Perfect for Everyone – Alex dreamed up TvB at age 7, but this crazy, fun strategic food fight is a smash with kids and adults alike! Ideal for ages from 7-107.
Easy to Learn and Quick to Play – Takes only a few minutes to learn. Gameplay runs 10-15 minutes. Optimal for 2-4 players.
Brilliant Gift Idea – Makes the perfect birthday for boys, girls, parents, adults, friends, or family as well as any board game or card game lover. Great for birthdays, Mothers Day, Fathers Day, and Taco Tuesday
